channel.title: Pipes on Luke Jaeger
channel.description: Recent content in Pipes on Luke Jaeger

item.title: Dream | Larry King Officiates A Wedding In The City Of Giant Pipes
Recursive Pipe Painting 1
item.description: Started making paintings on paper of these giant pipes waiting to be buried. It wasn’t that interesting, but then I thought of making paintings of the pipes on the pipes. No audience except maybe a few construction workers, and whoever digs up the pipes in some future century.
